django.contrib.admin.templatetags.admin_modify
==============================================

.. py:module:: django.contrib.admin.templatetags.admin_modify


Attributes
----------

.. autoapisummary::

   django.contrib.admin.templatetags.admin_modify.register


Functions

.. autoapisummary::

Module Contents
---------------

.. py:data:: register

.. py:function:: prepopulated_fields_js(context)

   Create a list of prepopulated_fields that should render JavaScript for
   the prepopulated fields for both the admin form and inlines.


.. py:function:: prepopulated_fields_js_tag(parser, token)

.. py:function:: submit_row(context)

   Display the row of buttons for delete and save.


.. py:function:: submit_row_tag(parser, token)

.. py:function:: change_form_object_tools_tag(parser, token)

   Display the row of change form object tools.


.. py:function:: cell_count(inline_admin_form)

   Return the number of cells used in a tabular inline.
